content.raw:
June 11: Currently using [http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=gui\_overlay&cat=user\_input](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=gui_overlay&cat=user_input) as a reference for GUI Overlays. Trying to make MVP simply to subcribe to `/vrx/task/info` and display VRX Task Info data. There are build issues relating to finding Qt5. Output shown below

-- Gazebo version: 9.9  
-- Could NOT find Qt5Widgets \(missing: Qt5Widgets\_DIR\)  
-- Could not find the required component 'Qt5Widgets'. The following CMake error indicates that you either need to install the package with the same name or change your environment so that it can be found.  
CMake Error at /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/catkinConfig.cmake:83 \(find\_package\):  
Could not find a package configuration file provided by "Qt5Widgets" with  
any of the following names:

```
Qt5WidgetsConfig.cmake
qt5widgets-config.cmake
```

Add the installation prefix of "Qt5Widgets" to CMAKE\_PREFIX\_PATH or set  
"Qt5Widgets\_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.  If  
"Qt5Widgets" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has  
been installed.  
Call Stack \(most recent call first\):  
vrx/vrx\_gazebo/CMakeLists.txt:12 \(find\_package\)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!  
See also "/home/tylerlum/vrx\_ws/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".  
See also "/home/tylerlum/vrx\_ws/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
content.html:
June 11: Currently using http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=gui_overlay&cat=user_input as a reference for GUI Overlays. Trying to make MVP simply to subcribe to /vrx/task/info and display VRX Task Info data. There are build issues relating to finding Qt5. Output shown below

-- Gazebo version: 9.9
-- Could NOT find Qt5Widgets (missing: Qt5Widgets_DIR)
-- Could not find the required component 'Qt5Widgets'. The following CMake error indicates that you either need to install the package with the same name or change your environment so that it can be found.
CMake Error at /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/catkinConfig.cmake:83 (find_package):
Could not find a package configuration file provided by "Qt5Widgets" with
any of the following names:

Qt5WidgetsConfig.cmake
qt5widgets-config.cmake

Add the installation prefix of "Qt5Widgets" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
"Qt5Widgets_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files. If
"Qt5Widgets" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has
been installed.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
vrx/vrx_gazebo/CMakeLists.txt:12 (find_package)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
